channel.title: Client Doesn't Disconnect The Player After Logout
channel.description: When someone logs out of my server, the clienthandler doesn't disconnect their client, so they can't get back in. How do I make it so that when they logout, the client disconnects them?

item.title: Client Doesn't Disconnect The Player After Logout
item.dc:creator: @Kalphiter Kalphiter
item.description:
@Kalphiter wrote:

Hmmmm… must be the server.

Look for it.

switch(packetType) {

Add this in numerical order…

case 202: // idle logout packet - ignore for now logout(); break;

Read full topic
item.source: Client Doesn't Disconnect The Player After Logout
